Privacy Policy

For QalbyMuslim. Last updated: October 23, 2025.

Quick Summary

  • ‚Ä¢Data controller: Qalbymuslim ‚Äî contact: qalbymuslim1@gmail.com
  • ‚Ä¢Data we collect: Location (with consent), optional calendar access, notification tokens, limited device/diagnostic data, support messages, anonymized analytics/crash reports, and any information you voluntarily share.
  • ‚Ä¢Why we collect it: To deliver app features, send reminders you enable, improve performance, respond to support, and comply with legal obligations.
  • ‚Ä¢Sharing: We do not sell personal data. We only share data with processors required to provide app functionality.
  • ‚Ä¢Your rights: Adjust permissions on your device, request access or deletion via email, and exercise GDPR/CCPA rights where applicable.

Who We Are

Qalbymuslim is the data controller responsible for Qalby Muslim. Contact us at qalbymuslim1@gmail.com for any privacy questions or to submit access, correction, or deletion requests. Please include "Privacy Request" in the subject line so we can respond quickly.

Information We Collect

Location (optional)

Used to calculate prayer times and the Qibla direction for your location. Requested only when you initiate a location-based feature and with your explicit permission. Coordinates are stored locally and not uploaded except when calling third-party services.

Notification Token

Generated by your device when you enable push notifications. Stored with our push provider (Expo Notifications/EAS, Apple APNs, or Google FCM) so we can deliver reminders you turn on.

Calendar Access (optional)

Used only if you choose to add prayer or reminder events to your personal calendar. Events are created at your direction; we do not access or sync existing calendar entries.

Device & Diagnostic Data

Includes device type, operating system, app version, IP address, crash logs, and limited usage statistics. Helps us diagnose issues, combat fraud, and understand how features perform.

Support Requests

When you contact us, we receive the name, email, and message you provide to resolve your inquiry.

Analytics & Crash Reporting (optional)

Privacy-minded tools may capture pseudonymized usage data and crash reports. This build does not include analytics SDKs by default. Where required by law, we request consent before enabling analytics.

How We Use Your Information

  • ‚úìDeliver core features such as prayer schedules, Qibla direction, Quran reading, and saved preferences.
  • ‚úìSend notifications and reminders you explicitly enable (e.g., daily prayer alerts).
  • ‚úìStore settings locally so the app feels personalized each time you return.
  • ‚úìAnalyze performance, troubleshoot crashes, and improve reliability.
  • ‚úìProvide customer support, answer questions, and resolve technical issues.
  • ‚úìMeet legal obligations, enforce our terms, and prevent misuse or fraud.

We do not use your data for targeted advertising.

Sharing & Third-Party Processing

We do not sell personal data. We work with processors who help operate Qalby Muslim under strict data protection agreements:

  • ‚Ä¢Prayer time APIs: Aladhan, to fetch accurate schedules.
  • ‚Ä¢Push notification services: Expo Notifications/EAS, Apple APNs, Google FCM.
  • ‚Ä¢Hosting & infrastructure: Platforms such as Hostinger for web content.
  • ‚Ä¢Geolocation services: For reverse geocoding to display place names.

Third-Party Endpoints

  • ‚Ä¢ api.aladhan.com ‚Äî prayer times computation
  • ‚Ä¢ nominatim.openstreetmap.org ‚Äî reverse geocoding
  • ‚Ä¢ worldtimeapi.org ‚Äî timezone/date information
  • ‚Ä¢ Stripe ‚Äî donation payment processing

Your Rights & Choices

Manage Device Permissions

Location & notifications: Adjust or revoke access via device settings. Calendar access: Decline permission; the app will not create calendar events without your approval.

Data Access, Correction & Deletion

Email qalbymuslim1@gmail.com with subject 'Privacy Request ‚Äî [Access|Deletion|Other]'. Include your name, email, country of residence, and a brief summary. We verify identity where necessary and respond within 30 days.

GDPR (EEA/UK) Rights

Rights include access, correction, deletion, restriction, objection, portability, and challenges to automated decision-making. Contact us to exercise these rights.

CCPA/CPRA (California) Rights

California residents may request details about collected information, request deletion, and confirm we do not sell personal data.

Storage & Retention

  • On-device storage: Preferences and cached data remain on your device until you clear them or uninstall the app.
  • Support messages: Kept only as long as necessary to resolve your inquiry and up to 24 months afterward.
  • Analytics/crash data: Stored in aggregated or anonymized form, generally for 12‚Äì36 months depending on the provider.

We delete or anonymize personal data when it is no longer needed or when you request deletion, subject to legal requirements.

Children's Privacy

Qalby Muslim is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. If you believe your child has provided information to us, contact us and we will delete it promptly.

Contact us at qalbymuslim1@gmail.com with the subject line "Privacy Request ‚Äî Child Data" and we will take steps to remove the data as quickly as possible.

Information Security

We implement reasonable technical, administrative, and physical safeguards to protect your information. No system is completely secure, so please notify us at qalbymuslim1@gmail.com immediately if you suspect an issue.

Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, contact us:

Email: qalbymuslim1@gmail.com

Subject: "Privacy Request ‚Äî [Access|Deletion|Other]"

Website: https://qalbymuslim.com/privacy-policy

We aim to acknowledge and respond to all legitimate requests within 30 days.
